장비

EQUIPMENT

Assume a character owns at least one outfit of normal clothes. Pick any one of the following 의류 outfits: artisan의 outfit, entertainer의 outfit, explorer의 outfit, 수도사의 outfit, peasant의 outfit, scholar의 outfit, or traveler의 outfit.

재산과 화폐

WEALTH AND MONEY

동전

COINS

The most common coin is the gold piece (gp). A gold piece is worth 10 silver pieces. Each silver piece is worth 10 copper pieces (cp). In addition to copper, silver, and gold 동전, there are also platinum pieces (pp), which are each worth 10 gp.

The standard coin weighs about a third of an ounce (fifty to the pound).

전리품 판매

SELLING LOOT

In general, a character can sell something for half its listed price.

Trade goods are the exception to the half-price rule. A trade good, in this sense, is a valuable good that can be easily exchanged almost as if it were cash itself.

무기

WEAPONS

무기 분류

WEAPON CATEGORIES

무기 are grouped into several interlocking sets of categories.

These categories pertain to what training is needed to become proficient in a weapon의 use (simple, martial, or exotic), the weapon의 usefulness either in close 전투(melee) or at a distance (ranged, which includes both thrown and 투사 무기), its relative encumbrance (빛, 한손, or 양손), and its size (Small, Medium, or Large).

단순, 무예, 생소한 무기: Anybody but a 드루이드, 수도사, 도적, or 마법사 is proficient with all 단순 무기. 바바리안, 전사, 성기사, and 레인저 are proficient with all simple and all 무예 무기. Characters of other classes are proficient with an assortment of mainly 단순 무기 and possibly also some martial or even 생소한 무기. A character who uses a weapon with which he or she is not proficient takes a –4 페널티 on 명중 굴림.

근접, 원거리 무기: 근접 무기 are used for making melee 공격, though some of them can be thrown as well. Ranged 무기 are 투척 무기 or 투사 무기 that are not effective in melee.

긴 무기: Glaives, 극창, 랜스, 롱스피어, 란서s, spiked chains, and 채찍 are 긴 무기. A 긴 무기 is a 근접 무기 that allows its wielder to strike at targets that aren’t adjacent to him or her. Most reach double the wielder의 natural reach, meaning that a typical Small or Medium wielder of such a weapon can 공격 a creature 10 feet away, but not a creature in an adjacent square. A typical Large character wielding a 긴 무기 of the appropriate size can 공격 a creature 15 or 20 feet away, but not adjacent creatures or creatures up to 10 feet away.

쌍날 무기: Dire flails, 드워프 어그로셰, 노움 갈고리 망치, 오크 쌍날 도끼s, 육척봉, and 쌍날검 are 쌍날 무기. A character can fight with both ends of a 쌍날 무기 as if fighting with two 무기, but he or she incurs all the normal 공격 페널티 associated with two-weapon 전투, just as though the character were wielding a 한손 무기 and a 가벼운 무기.

The character can also choose to use a 쌍날 무기 two handed, attacking with only one end of it. A creature wielding a 쌍날 무기 in one hand can’t use it as a double weapon—only one end of the weapon can be used in any given round.

투척 무기: 단검, clubs, 숏스피어s, 창, darts, 투창, throwing axes, 빛 망치, 삼지창, 표창, and 그물 are 투척 무기. The wielder applies his or her 근력 수정치 to 피해 dealt by 투척 무기(except for splash 무기). It is possible to throw a weapon that isn’t designed to be thrown (that is, a 근접 무기 that doesn’t have a numeric entry in 거리 Increment column on 표: 무기), but a character who does so takes a –4 페널티 on 명중 굴림. Throwing a 빛 or 한손 무기 is a standard action, while throwing a 양손 무기 is a full-round action. Regardless of the type of weapon, such an 공격 scores a threat only on a natural roll of 20 and deals double 피해 on a critical hit. Such a weapon has a 거리 increment of 10 feet.

투사 무기: 빛 crossbows, 무릿매, heavy crossbows, 합성 숏보우 숏보우, 합성 롱보우 롱보우, hand crossbows, and repeating crossbows are 투사 무기. Most 투사 무기 require two hands to use (see specific 무기 설명). A character gets no 근력 보너스 on 피해 rolls with a 투사 무기 unless it의 a specially built composite 숏보우, specially built composite 롱보우, or 무릿매. If the character has a 페널티 for low 근력, apply it to 피해 rolls when he or she uses a bow or a 무릿매.

탄알: 투사 무기 use ammunition: arrows (for bows), 석궁화살(for crossbows), or 무릿매 bullets (for 무릿매). When using a bow, a character can draw ammunition as a free action; crossbows and 무릿매 require an action for reloading. Generally speaking, ammunition that hits its target is destroyed or rendered useless, while normal ammunition that misses has a 50% chance of being destroyed or lost.

Although they are 투척 무기, 표창 are treated as ammunition for 목적 of drawing them, crafting 명품 or otherwise special versions of them (see 명품 무기), and what happens to them after they are thrown.

빛, 한손, and 양손 근접 무기: This designation is a measure of how much effort it takes to wield a weapon in 전투. It indicates whether a 근접 무기, when wielded by a character of the weapon의 size category, is considered a 가벼운 무기, a 한손 무기, or a 양손 무기.

가벼움: A 가벼운 무기 is easier to use in one의 off hand than a 한손 무기 is, and it can be used while grappling. A 가벼운 무기 is used in one hand. Add the wielder의 근력 보너스(if any) to 피해 rolls for melee 공격 with a 가벼운 무기 if it의 used in the primary hand, or one-half the wielder의 근력 보너스 if it의 used in the off hand. Using two hands to wield a 가벼운 무기 gives no advantage on 피해; 근력 보너스 applies as though the weapon were held in the wielder의 primary hand only.

비무장 공격 is always considered a 가벼운 무기.

한손: A 한손 무기 can be used in either the primary hand or the off hand. Add the wielder의 근력 보너스 to 피해 rolls for melee 공격 with a 한손 무기 if it의 used in the primary hand, or 1/2 his or her 근력 보너스 if it의 used in the off hand. If a 한손 무기 is wielded with two hands during melee 전투, add 1-1/2 times the character의 근력 보너스 to 피해 rolls.

양손: Two hands are required to use a 양손 근접 무기 effectively. Apply 1-1/2 times the character의 근력 보너스 to 피해 rolls for melee 공격 with such a weapon.

무기의 크기: Every weapon has a size category. This designation indicates the size of the creature for which the weapon was designed.

A weapon의 size category isn’t the same as its size as an object. Instead, a weapon의 size category is keyed to the size of the intended wielder. In general, a 가벼운 무기 is an object two size categories smaller than the wielder, a 한손 무기 is an object one size category smaller than the wielder, and a 양손 weapon is an object of the same size category as the wielder.

부적절한 크기의 무기: A creature can’t make optimum use of a weapon that isn’t properly sized for it. A cumulative –2 페널티 applies on 명중 굴림 for each size category of difference between the size of its intended wielder and the size of its actual wielder. If the creature isn’t proficient with the weapon a –4 nonproficiency 페널티 also applies.

The measure of how much effort it takes to use a weapon (whether the weapon is designated as a 빛, 한손, or 양손 무기 for a particular wielder) is altered by one step for each size category of difference between the wielder의 size and the size of the creature for which the weapon was designed. If a weapon의 designation would be changed to something other than 빛, 한손, or 양손 by this alteration, the creature can’t wield the weapon at all.

임시 무기: Sometimes objects not crafted to be 무기 nonetheless see use in 전투. Because such objects are not designed for this use, any creature that uses one in 전투 I considered to be nonproficient with it and takes a –4 페널티 on 명중 굴림 made with that object. To determine the size category and appropriate 피해 for an improvised weapon, compare its relative size and 피해 potential to the weapon list to find a reasonable match. An improvised weapon scores a threat on a natural roll of 20 and deals double 피해 on a critical hit. An improvised 투척 무기 has a 거리 increment of 10 feet.

무기 품질

WEAPON QUALITIES

Here is the format for weapon entries (given as column headings on 표: 무기, below).

비용: This value is the weapon의 cost in gold pieces (gp) or silver pieces (sp). The cost includes 기타 gear that goes with the weapon.

This cost is the same for a Small or Medium version of the weapon. A Large version costs twice the listed price.

피해: 피해 columns give 피해 dealt by the weapon on a successful hit. The column labeled “Dmg (S)” is for Small 무기. The column labeled “Dmg (M)” is for Medium 무기. If two 피해 거리 are given then the weapon is a 쌍날 무기. Use the second 피해 figure given for the double weapon의 extra 공격. 표: Tiny and Large Weapon 피해 gives weapon 피해 values for 무기 of those sizes.

표: Tiny and Large Weapon 피해

치명타: The entry in this column notes how the weapon is used with the rules for critical hits. When your character scores a critical hit, roll 피해 two, three, or four times, as indicated by its critical multiplier (using all applicable 수정치 on each roll), and add all the results together.

예외: Extra 피해 over and above a weapon의 normal 피해 is not multiplied when you score a critical hit.

x2: The weapon deals double 피해 on a critical hit.

x3: The weapon deals triple 피해 on a critical hit.

x3/x4: One head of this 쌍날 무기 deals triple 피해 on a critical hit. The other head deals quadruple 피해 on a critical hit.

x4: The weapon deals quadruple 피해 on a critical hit.

19–20/x2: The weapon scores a threat on a natural roll of 19 or 20 (instead of just 20) and deals double 피해 on a critical hit. (The weapon has a threat 거리 of 19–20.)

18–20/x2: The weapon scores a threat on a natural roll of 18, 19, or 20 (instead of just 20) and deals double 피해 on a critical hit. (The weapon has a threat 거리 of 18–20.)

거리 Increment: Any 공격 at less than this distance is not penalized for 거리. However, each full 거리 increment imposes a cumulative –2 페널티 on 명중 굴림. A 투척 무기 has a maximum 거리 of five 거리 increments. A 투사 무기 can shoot out to ten 거리 increments.

무게: This column gives the weight of a Medium version of the weapon. Halve this number for Small 무기 and double it for Large 무기.

유형: 무기 are classified according to the type of 피해 they deal: bludgeoning, piercing, or slashing. Some 몬스터 may be resistant or immune to 공격 from certain types of 무기.

Some 무기 deal 피해 of multiple types. If a weapon is of two types, 피해 it deals is not half one type and half another; all of it is both types. Therefore, a creature would have to be immune to both types of 피해 to ignore any of 피해 from such a weapon.

In other cases, a weapon can deal either of two types of 피해. In a situation when 피해 type is significant, the wielder can choose which type of 피해 to deal with such a weapon.

특수: Some 무기 have special features. See 무기 설명 for details.

무기 found on 표: 무기 that have special options for the wielder (“you”) are described below. Splash 무기 are described under 특수 물질과 아이템.

화살: An arrow used as a 근접 무기 is treated as a 빛 improvised weapon (–4 페널티 on 명중 굴림) and deals 피해 as a 단검 of its size (critical multiplier x2). Arrows come in a leather quiver that holds 20 arrows. An arrow that hits its target is destroyed; one that misses has a 50% chance of being destroyed or lost.

도끼, 오크 쌍날: An 오크 쌍날 도끼 is a 쌍날 무기. You can fight with it as if fighting with two 무기, but if you do, you incur all the normal 공격 페널티 associated with fighting with two 무기, just as if you were using a 한손 무기 and a 가벼운 무기.

A creature wielding an 오크 쌍날 도끼 in one hand can’t use it as a double weapon—only one end of the weapon can be used in any given round.

팔맷돌: You can use this weapon to make a ranged 넘어뜨리기 공격 against an opponent. You can’t be tripped during your own 넘어뜨리기 attempt when using a set of 팔맷돌.

석궁화살: A 석궁화살 used as a 근접 무기 is treated as a 빛 improvised weapon (–4 페널티 on 명중 굴림) and deals 피해 as a 단검 of its size (crit x2). 석궁화살 come in a wooden case that holds 10 석궁화살 (or 5, for a repeating crossbow). A 석궁화살 that hits its target is destroyed; one that misses has a 50% chance of being destroyed or lost.

무릿매 탄알: Bullets come in a leather pouch that holds 10 bullets. A bullet that hits its target is destroyed; one that misses has a 50% chance of being destroyed or lost.

가시 사슬: A spiked chain has reach, so you can strike opponents 10 feet away with it. In addition, unlike most other 무기 with reach, it can be used against an adjacent foe.

You can make 넘어뜨리기 공격 with the chain. If you are tripped during your own 넘어뜨리기 attempt, you can drop the chain to avoid being tripped.

When using a spiked chain, you get a +2 보너스 on opposed 명중 굴림 made to 무장해제 an opponent (including the roll to avoid being disarmed if such an attempt fails).

You can use 무기 기교 feat to apply your 민첩 수정치 instead of your 근력 수정치 to 명중 굴림 with a spiked chain sized for you, even though it isn’t a 가벼운 무기 for you.

손 석궁: You can draw a hand crossbow back by hand. Loading a hand crossbow is a 이동 action that provokes 기회 공격.

You can shoot, but not load, a hand crossbow with one hand at no 페널티. You can shoot a hand crossbow with each hand, but you take 페널티 on 명중 굴림 as if attacking with two 가벼운 무기.

무거운 석궁: You draw a heavy crossbow back by turning a small winch. Loading a heavy crossbow is a full-round action that provokes 기회 공격.

Normally, operating a heavy crossbow requires two hands. However, you can shoot, but not load, a heavy crossbow with one hand at a –4 페널티 on 명중 굴림. You can shoot a heavy crossbow with each hand, but you take 페널티 on 명중 굴림 as if attacking with two 한손 무기. This 페널티 is cumulative with the 페널티 for 한손 firing.

가벼운 석궁: You draw a 빛 crossbow back by pulling a lever. Loading a 빛 crossbow is a 이동 action that provokes 기회 공격.

Normally, operating a 빛 crossbow requires two hands. However, you can shoot, but not load, a 빛 crossbow with one hand at a –2 페널티 on 명중 굴림. You can shoot a 빛 crossbow with each hand, but you take a 페널티 on 명중 굴림 as if attacking with two 가벼운 무기. This 페널티 is cumulative with 페널티 for 한손 firing.

연노 석궁: The repeating crossbow (whether 무겁거나 가벼움) holds 5 석궁화살. As long as it holds 석궁화살, you can reload it by pulling the reloading lever (a free action). Loading a new case of 5 석궁화살 is a full-round action that provokes 기회 공격.

You can fire a repeating crossbow with one hand or fire a repeating crossbow in each hand in the same manner as you would a normal crossbow of the same size. However, you must fire the weapon with two hands in order to use the reloading lever, and you must use two hands to load a new case of 석궁화살.

단검: You get a +2 보너스 on 날렵한 손재주 checks made to conceal a 단검 on your body (see 날렵한 손재주 skill).

삼절 철퇴: A dire 철퇴 is a 쌍날 무기. You can fight with it as if fighting with two 무기, but if you do, you incur all the normal 공격 페널티 associated with fighting with two 무기, just as if you were using a 한손 weapon and a 가벼운 무기. A creature wielding a dire 철퇴 in one hand can’t use it as a double weapon— only one end of the weapon can be used in any given round.

When using a dire 철퇴, you get a +2 보너스 on opposed 명중 굴림 made to 무장해제 an enemy (including the opposed 명중 굴림 to avoid being disarmed if such an attempt fails).

You can also use this weapon to make 넘어뜨리기 공격. If you are tripped during your own 넘어뜨리기 attempt, you can drop the dire 철퇴 to avoid being tripped.

철퇴, 무거운 철퇴: With a 철퇴, you get a +2 보너스 on opposed 명중 굴림 made to 무장해제 an enemy (including the roll to avoid being disarmed if such an attempt fails).

You can also use this weapon to make 넘어뜨리기 공격. If you are tripped during your own 넘어뜨리기 attempt, you can drop the 철퇴 to avoid being tripped.

건틀릿: This metal glove lets you deal lethal 피해 rather than 비치명적인 피해 with 비무장 공격. A strike with a 건틀릿 is otherwise considered an unarmed 공격. The cost and weight given are for a single 건틀릿. Medium and heavy 갑옷(except 가슴보호갑) come with gauntlets.

가시 건틀릿: Your opponent cannot use a 무장해제 action to 무장해제 you of spiked gauntlets. The cost and weight given are for a single 건틀릿. An 공격 with a spiked 건틀릿 is considered an armed 공격.

롱스피어: A 롱스피어 has reach. You can strike opponents 10 feet away with it, but you can’t use it against an adjacent foe.

극창: A 극창 has reach. You can strike opponents 10 feet away with it, but you can’t use it against an adjacent foe.

You can also use it to make 넘어뜨리기 공격. If you are tripped during your own 넘어뜨리기 attempt, you can drop the 극창 to avoid being tripped.

할버드: If you use a 준비 action to set a 할버드 against a 돌격, you deal double 피해 on a successful hit against a charging character.

You can use a 할버드 to make 넘어뜨리기 공격. If you are tripped during your own 넘어뜨리기 attempt, you can drop the 할버드 to avoid being tripped.

노움 갈고리 망치: 노움 갈고리 망치 is a 쌍날 무기. You can fight with it as if fighting with two 무기, but if you do, you incur all the normal 공격 페널티 associated with fighting with two 무기, just as if you were using a 한손 무기 and a 가벼운 무기. 망치의 blunt head is a bludgeoning weapon that deals 1d6 points of 피해(crit x3). Its hook is a piercing weapon that deals 1d4 points of 피해(crit x4). You can use either head as the primary weapon. The other head is the offhand weapon. A creature wielding 노움 갈고리 망치 in one hand can’t use it as a double weapon—only one end of the weapon can be used in any given round.

You can use 노움 갈고리 망치 to make 넘어뜨리기 공격. If you are tripped during your own 넘어뜨리기 attempt, you can drop 노움 갈고리 망치 to avoid being tripped.

노움 treat 노움 갈고리 망치 as 무예 무기.

투창: Since it is not designed for melee, you are treated as nonproficient with it and take a –4 페널티 on 명중 굴림 if you use a 투창 as a 근접 무기.

낫: The 낫 is a special 수도사 weapon. This designation gives a 수도사 wielding a 낫 special options.

You can use a 낫 to make 넘어뜨리기 공격. If you are tripped during your own 넘어뜨리기 attempt, you can drop the 낫 to avoid being tripped.

랜스: A 랜스 deals double 피해 when used from the back of a charging 탈것. It has reach, so you can strike opponents 10 feet away with it, but you can’t use it against an adjacent foe.

While mounted, you can wield a 랜스 with one hand.

롱보우: You need at least two hands to use a bow, regardless of its size. A 롱보우 is too unwieldy to use while you are mounted. If you have 페널티 for low 근력, apply it to 피해 rolls when you use a 롱보우. If you have 보너스 for high 근력, you can apply it to 피해 rolls when you use a composite 롱보우 (see below) but not a regular 롱보우.

합성 롱보우: You need at least two hands to use a bow, regardless of its size. You can use a composite 롱보우 while mounted. All composite bows are made with a particular 근력 rating (that is, each requires a minimum 근력 수정치 to use with proficiency). If your 근력 보너스 is less than 근력 rating of 합성궁, you can’t effectively use it, so you take a –2 페널티 on 공격 with it. The default composite 롱보우 requires a 근력 수정치 of +0 or higher to use with proficiency. A composite 롱보우 can be made with a high 근력 rating to take advantage of an above-average 근력 score; this feature allows you to add your 근력 보너스 to 피해, up to the maximum 보너스 indicated for the bow. Each point of 근력 보너스 granted by the bow adds 100 gp to its cost.

For 목적 of weapon proficiency and similar 특기, a composite 롱보우 is treated as if it were a 롱보우.

롱스피어: A 롱스피어 has reach. You can strike opponents 10 feet away with it, but you can’t use it against an adjacent foe. If you use a 준비 action to set a 롱스피어 against a 돌격, you deal double 피해 on a successful hit against a charging character.

그물: 그물 is used to 휘감기 enemies. When you throw 그물, you make a ranged touch 공격 against your target. A 그물의 maximum 거리 is 10 feet. If you hit, the target is entangled. An entangled creature takes a –2 페널티 on 명중 굴림 and a –4 페널티 on 민첩, can 이동 at only half 속도, and cannot 돌격 or 달리기. If you control the trailing rope by succeeding on an opposed 근력 check while holding it, the entangled creature can 이동 only within the limits that the rope allows. If the entangled creature attempts to 주문 시전, it must make a DC 15 집중 check or be unable to cast the spell.

An entangled creature can escape with a DC 20 탈출 전문가 check (a full-round action). The 그물 has 5 히트 포인트 and can be 폭발 with a DC 25 근력 check (also a full-round action).

그물 is useful only against creatures within one size category of you.

그물 must be folded to be thrown effectively. The first time you throw your 그물 in a fight, you make a normal ranged touch 명중 굴림. After the 그물 is unfolded, you take a –4 페널티 on 명중 굴림 with it. It takes 2 rounds for a proficient user to fold 그물 and twice that long for a nonproficient one to do so.

쌍절곤: The 쌍절곤 is a special 수도사 weapon. This designation gives a 수도사 wielding a 쌍절곤 special options. With a 쌍절곤, you get a +2 보너스 on opposed 명중 굴림 made to 무장해제 an enemy (including the roll to avoid being disarmed if such an attempt fails).

육척봉: A 육척봉 is a 쌍날 무기. You can fight with it as if fighting with two 무기, but if you do, you incur all the normal 공격 페널티 associated with fighting with two 무기, just as if you were using a 한손 무기 and a 가벼운 무기. A creature wielding a 육척봉 in one hand can’t use it as a double weapon—only one end of the weapon can be used in any given round.

The 육척봉 is a special 수도사 weapon. This designation gives a 수도사 wielding a 육척봉 special options.

란서: A 란서 has reach. You can strike opponents 10 feet away with it, but you can’t use it against an adjacent foe.

With a 란서, you get a +2 보너스 on opposed 명중 굴림 made to 무장해제 an opponent (including the roll to avoid being disarmed if such an attempt fails).

레이피어: You can use 무기 기교 feat to apply your 민첩 수정치 instead of your 근력 수정치 to 명중 굴림 with a 레이피어 sized for you, even though it isn’t a 가벼운 무기 for you. You can’t wield a 레이피어 in two hands in order to apply 1-1/2 times your 근력 보너스 to 피해.

사이: With a 사이, you get a +4 보너스 on opposed 명중 굴림 made to 무장해제 an enemy (including the roll to avoid being disarmed if such an attempt fails).

The 사이 is a special 수도사 weapon. This designation gives a 수도사 wielding a 사이 special options.

대낫: A 대낫 can be used to make 넘어뜨리기 공격. If you are tripped during your own 넘어뜨리기 attempt, you can drop the 대낫 to avoid being tripped.

방패, 무겁거나 가벼움: You can bash with a 방패 instead of using it for defense. See 갑옷 for details.

숏보우: You need at least two hands to use a bow, regardless of its size. You can use a 숏보우 while mounted. If you have 페널티 for low 근력, apply it to 피해 rolls when you use a 숏보우. If you have 보너스 for high 근력, you can apply it to 피해 rolls when you use a composite 숏보우 (see below) but not a regular 숏보우.

합성 숏보우: You need at least two hands to use a bow, regardless of its size. You can use a composite 숏보우 while mounted. All composite bows are made with a particular 근력 rating (that is, each requires a minimum 근력 수정치 to use with proficiency). If your 근력 보너스 is lower than 근력 rating of 합성궁, you can’t effectively use it, so you take a –2 페널티 on 공격 with it. The default composite 숏보우 requires a 근력 수정치 of +0 or higher to use with proficiency. A composite 숏보우 can be made with a high 근력 rating to take advantage of an above-average 근력 score; this feature allows you to add your 근력 보너스 to 피해, up to the maximum 보너스 indicated for the bow. Each point of 근력 보너스 granted by the bow adds 75 gp to its cost.

For 목적 of weapon proficiency and similar 특기, a composite 숏보우 is treated as if it were a 숏보우.

숏스피어: A 숏스피어 is small enough to wield 한손. It may also be thrown.

표창: A 표창 is a special 수도사 weapon. This designation gives a 수도사 wielding 표창 special options. A 표창 can’t be used as a 근접 무기.

Although they are 투척 무기, 표창 are treated as ammunition for 목적 of drawing them, crafting 명품 or otherwise special versions of them and what happens to them after they are thrown.

샹함: The 샹함 is a special 수도사 weapon. This designation gives a 수도사 wielding a 샹함 special options.

갈고리낫: A 갈고리낫 can be used to make 넘어뜨리기 공격. If you are tripped during your own 넘어뜨리기 attempt, you can drop the 갈고리낫 to avoid being tripped.

무릿매: Your 근력 수정치 applies to 피해 rolls when you use a 무릿매, just as it does for 투척 무기. You can fire, but not load, a 무릿매 with one hand. Loading a 무릿매 is a 이동 action that requires two hands and provokes 기회 공격.

You can hurl ordinary stones with a 무릿매, but stones are not as dense or as round as bullets. Thus, such an 공격 deals 피해 as if the weapon were designed for a creature one size category smaller than you and you take a –1 페널티 on 명중 굴림.

Spear: A spear can be thrown. If you use a 준비 action to set a spear against a 돌격, you deal double 피해 on a successful hit against a charging character.

가시 갑옷: You can outfit your 갑옷 with spikes, which can deal 피해 in a 드잡이 or as a separate 공격. See 갑옷 for details.

가시 방패, 무겁거나 가벼움: You can bash with a 가시 방패 instead of using it for defense. See 갑옷 for details.

비무장 공격: A Medium character deals 1d3 points of 비치명적인 피해 with 비무장 공격. A Small character deals 1d2 points of 비치명적인 피해. A 수도사 or any character with 향상된 비무장 타격 feat can deal lethal or 비치명적인 피해 with 비무장 공격, at her option. 피해 from 비무장 공격 is considered weapon 피해 for 목적 of effects that give you 보너스 on weapon 피해 rolls.

비무장 공격 is always considered a 가벼운 무기. Therefore, you can use 무기 기교 feat to apply your 민첩 수정치 instead of your 근력 수정치 to 명중 굴림 with 비무장 공격.

바스타드 소드: 바스타드 소드 is too large to use in one hand without special training; thus, it is an exotic weapon. A character can use 바스타드 소드 양손 as a 무예 무기.

쌍날검: 쌍날검 is a 쌍날 무기. You can fight with it as if fighting with two 무기, but if you do, you incur all the normal 공격 페널티 associated with fighting with two 무기, just as if you were using a 한손 무기 and a 가벼운 무기. A creature wielding 쌍날검 in one hand can’t use it as a double weapon—only one end of the weapon can be used in any given round.

삼지창: This weapon can be thrown. If you use a 준비 action to set 삼지창 against a 돌격, you deal double 피해 on a successful hit against a charging character.

드워프 어그로셰: 드워프 어그로셰 is a 쌍날 무기. You can fight with it as if fighting with two 무기, but if you do, you incur all the normal 공격 페널티 associated with fighting with two 무기, just as if you were using a 한손 무기 and a 가벼운 무기. The urgrosh의 axe head is a slashing weapon that deals 1d8 points of 피해. Its spear head is a piercing weapon that deals 1d6 points of 피해. You can use either head as the primary weapon. The other is 주로 쓰지 않는 손에 들린 무기. A creature wielding 드워프 어그로셰 in one hand can’t use it as a double weapon—only one end of the weapon can be used in any given round.

If you use a 준비 action to set an urgrosh against a 돌격, you deal double 피해 if you score a hit against a charging character. If you use an urgrosh against a charging character, the spear head is the part of the weapon that deals 피해.

드워프 treat 드워프 어그로셰 as 무예 무기.

드워프 전투도끼: 드워프 전투도끼 is too large to use in one hand without special training; thus, it is an exotic weapon. A Medium character can use 드워프 전투도끼 양손 as a 무예 무기, or a Large creature can use it 한손 in the same way. 드워프 treats 드워프 전투도끼 as a 무예 무기 even when using it in one hand.

채찍: 채찍 deals 비치명적인 피해. It deals no 피해 to any creature with an 갑옷 보너스 of +1 or higher or a 자연 갑옷 보너스 of +3 or higher. 채찍 is treated as a 근접 무기 with 15-foot reach, though you don’t threaten 범위 into which you can make an 공격. In addition, unlike most other 무기 with reach, you can use it against foes anywhere within your reach (including adjacent foes).

Using 채찍 provokes an 공격 of opportunity, just as if you had used a 원거리 무기.

You can make 넘어뜨리기 공격 with 채찍. If you are tripped during your own 넘어뜨리기 attempt, you can drop 채찍 to avoid being tripped.

When using 채찍, you get a +2 보너스 on opposed 명중 굴림 made to 무장해제 an opponent (including the roll to keep from being disarmed if 공격 fails).

You can use 무기 기교 feat to apply your 민첩 수정치 instead of your 근력 수정치 to 명중 굴림 with 채찍 sized for you, even though it isn’t a 가벼운 무기 for you.

명품 무기

MASTERWORK WEAPONS

A 명품 weapon is a finely crafted version of a normal weapon. Wielding it provides a +1 enhancement 보너스 on 명중 굴림.

You can’t add the 명품 quality to a weapon after it is created; it must be crafted as a 명품 weapon (see 제작 skill). The 명품 quality adds 300 gp to the cost of a normal weapon (or 6 gp to the cost of a single unit of ammunition). Adding the 명품 quality to a 쌍날 무기 costs twice the normal increase (+600 gp).

명품 ammunition is damaged (effectively destroyed) when used. The enhancement 보너스 of 명품 ammunition does not stack with any enhancement 보너스 of the 투사 무기 firing it.

All 마법 무기 are automatically considered to be of 명품 quality. The enhancement 보너스 granted by the 명품 quality doesn’t stack with the enhancement 보너스 provided by the weapon의 magic.

Even though some types of 갑옷 및 방패 can be used as 무기, you can’t create a 명품 version of such an item that confers an enhancement 보너스 on 명중 굴림. Instead, 명품 갑옷 및 방패 have lessened 갑옷 check 페널티.

갑옷

ARMOR

갑옷 품질

ARMOR QUALITIES

To wear heavier 갑옷 effectively, a character can select 갑옷 숙련 특기, but most classes are automatically proficient with 갑옷 that work best for them.

갑옷 및 방패 can take 피해 from some types of 공격.

Here is the format for 갑옷 entries (given as column headings on 표: 갑옷과 방패, below).

비용: The cost of 갑옷 for Small or Medium humanoid creatures. See 비표준 규격 갑옷, below, for 갑옷 prices for other creatures.

갑옷/방패 보너스: Each 갑옷 grants an 갑옷 보너스 to AC, while 방패 grant a 방패 보너스 to AC. 갑옷 보너스 from a suit of 갑옷 doesn’t stack with other effects or items that grant an 갑옷 보너스. Similarly, 방패 보너스 from a 방패 doesn’t stack with other effects that grant a 방패 보너스.

최대 Dex 보너스: This number is the maximum 민첩 보너스 to AC that this type of 갑옷 allows. Heavier 갑옷 limit 기동성, reducing the wearer의 ability to 회피 blows. This restriction doesn’t affect any other 민첩-related 능력.

Even if a character의 민첩 보너스 to AC drops to 0 because of 갑옷, this situation does not count as losing a 민첩 보너스 to AC.

Your character의 encumbrance (the amount of gear he or she carries) may also restrict the maximum 민첩 보너스 that can be applied to his or her 방어도.

방패: 방패 do not affect a character의 maximum 민첩 보너스.

갑옷 판정 페널티: Any 갑옷 heavier than leather hurts a character의 ability to use some 스킬. An 갑옷 판정 페널티 number is 페널티 that applies to 균형, 등반, 탈출 전문가, 숨기, 도약, 조용히 이동, 날렵한 손재주, and 재주넘기 checks by a character wearing a certain kind of 갑옷. Double the normal 갑옷 판정 페널티 is applied to 수영 checks. A character의 encumbrance (the amount of gear carried, including 갑옷) may also apply an 갑옷 check 페널티.

방패: If a character is wearing 갑옷 and using a 방패, both 갑옷 판정 페널티 apply.

입은 갑옷에 능숙하지 않음: A character who wears 갑옷 and/or uses a 방패 with which he or she is not proficient takes 갑옷의 (and/or 방패’s) 갑옷 판정 페널티 on 명중 굴림 and on all 근력-based and 민첩-based ability and 스킬 판정. 페널티 for nonproficiency with 갑옷 stacks with 페널티 for nonproficiency with 방패.

갑옷 입고 잠자기: A character who 수면 in medium or heavy 갑옷 is automatically fatigued the next day. He or she takes a –2 페널티 on 근력 and 민첩 and can’t 돌격 or 달리기. Sleeping in 경량 갑옷 does not cause fatigue.

비전 주문 실패: 갑옷 interferes with the gestures that a spellcaster must make to cast an arcane spell that has a somatic component. Arcane spellcasters face the possibility of 비전 주문 실패 if they’re wearing 갑옷. 음유시인 can wear 경량 갑옷 without incurring any 비전 주문 실패 chance for their 음유시인 주문.

The number in the 비전 주문 실패 Chance column on 표: 갑옷과 방패 is the chance that the spell fails and is ruined. If the spell lacks a somatic component, however, it can be cast with no chance of arcane 주문 실패.

갑옷 설명

ARMOR DESCRIPTIONS

Any special benefits or accessories to the types of 갑옷 found on 표: 갑옷과 방패 are described below.

갑옷 가시: You can have spikes added to your 갑옷, which allow you to deal extra piercing 피해(see 표: 무기) on a successful 드잡이 공격. The spikes count as a 무예 무기. If you are not proficient with them, you take a –4 페널티 on 드잡이 checks when you try to use them. You can also make a regular melee 공격(or 주로 쓰지 않는 손으로 하는 공격) with the spikes, and they count as a 가벼운 무기 in this case. (You can’t also make an 공격 with 갑옷 가시 if you have already made an 공격 with another 주로 쓰지 않는 손에 들린 무기, and vice versa.)

An enhancement 보너스 to a suit of 갑옷 does not improve the spikes’ effectiveness, but the spikes can be made into 마법 무기 in their own right.

띠매듭 갑옷: The suit includes gauntlets.

가슴보호갑: It comes with a helmet and greaves.

버클러: This small metal 방패 is worn strapped to your forearm. You can use a bow or crossbow without 페널티 while carrying it. You can also use your 방패 arm to wield a weapon (whether you are using an 주로 쓰지 않는 손에 들린 무기 or using your off hand to help wield a 양손 무기), but you take a –1 페널티 on 명중 굴림 while doing so. This 페널티 stacks with those that may apply for fighting with your off hand and for fighting with two 무기. In any case, if you use a weapon in your off hand, you don’t get 버클러의 AC 보너스 for the rest of the round.

You can’t bash someone with 버클러.

사슬 조끼: 사슬 조끼 comes with a steel cap.

사슬갑옷: The suit includes gauntlets.

판금갑옷: The suit includes gauntlets, heavy leather boots, a visored helmet, and a thick layer of padding that is worn underneath 갑옷. Each suit of 판금갑옷 must be individually fitted to its owner by a master armorsmith, although a captured suit can be resized to fit a new owner at a cost of 200 to 800 (2d4x100) gold pieces.

수갑형 건틀릿: This armored 건틀릿 has small chains and braces that allow the wearer to attach a weapon to the 건틀릿 so that it cannot be dropped easily. It provides a +10 보너스 on any roll made to keep from being disarmed in 전투. Removing a weapon from a locked 건틀릿 or attaching a weapon to a locked 건틀릿 is a full-round action that provokes 기회 공격.

The price given is for a single locked 건틀릿. The weight given applies only if you’re wearing a 가슴보호갑, 경량 갑옷, or no 갑옷. Otherwise, the locked 건틀릿 replaces a 건틀릿 you already have as part of 갑옷.

While the 건틀릿 is locked, you can’t use the hand wearing it for 주문 시전하기 or employing 스킬. (You can still cast 주문 with somatic 구성요소, provided that your other hand is free.)

Like a normal 건틀릿, a locked 건틀릿 lets you deal lethal 피해 rather than 비치명적인 피해 with an 비무장 공격.

약식 판금갑옷: The suit includes gauntlets.

미늘갑옷: The suit includes gauntlets.

무거운 방패, 목제 또는 철제: You strap a 방패 to your forearm and grip it with your hand. A heavy 방패 is so heavy that you can’t use your 방패 hand for anything else.

목제 또는 철제: Wooden and steel 방패 offer the same basic protection, though they respond differently to 특수 공격.

방패 공격: You can bash an opponent with a heavy 방패, using it as an 주로 쓰지 않는 손에 들린 무기. See 표: 무기 for 피해 dealt by a 방패 bash. Used this way, a heavy 방패 is a martial bludgeoning weapon. For the 목적 of 페널티 on 명중 굴림, treat a heavy 방패 as a 한손 무기. If you use your 방패 as a weapon, you lose its AC 보너스 until your next action (usually until the next round). An enhancement 보너스 on a 방패 does not improve the effectiveness of a 방패 bash made with it, but 방패 can be made into a 마법 무기 in its own right.

방패, 빛, 목제 또는 철제: You strap a 방패 to your forearm and grip it with your hand. A 경량 방패의 weight lets you carry other items in that hand, although you cannot use 무기 with it.

목제 또는 철제: Wooden and steel 방패 offer the same basic protection, though they respond differently to 특수 공격.

방패 공격: You can bash an opponent with a 경량 방패, using it as an 주로 쓰지 않는 손에 들린 무기. See 표: 무기 for 피해 dealt by a 방패 bash. Used this way, a 경량 방패 is a martial bludgeoning weapon. For 목적 of 페널티 on 명중 굴림, treat a 경량 방패 as a 가벼운 무기. If you use your 방패 as a weapon, you lose its AC 보너스 until your next action (usually until the next round). An enhancement 보너스 on a 방패 does not improve the effectiveness of a 방패 bash made with it, but 방패 can be made into a 마법 무기 in its own right.

장방패: This massive wooden 방패 is nearly as tall as you are. In most situations, it provides the indicated 방패 보너스 to your AC. However, you can instead use it as total 엄폐, though you must give up your 공격 to do so. 방패 does not, however, provide 엄폐 against targeted 주문; a spellcaster can 주문 시전 on you by targeting 방패 you are holding. You cannot bash with 장방패, nor can you use your 방패 hand for anything else.

When employing 장방패 in 전투, you take a –2 페널티 on 명중 굴림 because of 방패의 encumbrance.

방패 가시: When added to your 방패, these spikes turn it into a martial piercing weapon that increases 피해 dealt by a 방패 bash as if 방패 were designed for a creature one size category larger than you. You can’t put spikes on 버클러 or 장방패. Otherwise, attacking with a 가시 방패 is like making a 방패 bash 공격(see above).

An enhancement 보너스 on a 가시 방패 does not improve the effectiveness of a 방패 bash made with it, but a 가시 방패 can be made into a 마법 무기 in its own right.

찰갑: The suit includes gauntlets.
